amendatorysection.catchline: Commercial hazardous waste management facility; permittee; financial responsibility and insurance.
amendatorysection.para: As a condition of granting a permit for any commercial hazardous waste management facility, the permittee shall provide proof of financial responsibility pursuant to subdivision (21)(a) of section 81-1505 and liability insurance, including coverage against nonsudden and accidental occurrences, in an amount determined by the director.
